The purpose of_this provision was thus explained in the Court 's opinion : `` Section 7 is designed to arrest in its incipiency not_only the substantial lessening of competition from the acquisition by one corporation of the whole or any part of the stock of a competing corporation , but also to arrest in their incipiency restraints or monopolies in a relevant market which , as a reasonable probability , appear at the time of

Thus , a finding of conspiracy to restrain trade or attempt to monopolize was excluded from the Court 's decision .

We repeat , that the test of a violation of 7 is whether , at the time of
